channel.title: pork on Maiche Jewan

item.title: Pork Chops
item.description: Ingredients 1 Kg, pork Chops 1 tsp, ginger paste 1 tsp, garlic paste 1 tsp, turmeric powder 1 tsp, bafat powder whole spices ( 5 cloves, 7-8 black pepper corns, 2 cinnamon sticks, 1 cardamom, 2 bay leaves) sauces (1tbsp BBQ sauce, 2 tbsp chilly garlic sauce, 1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce, 1 tbsp vinegar, 1 tsp lemon juice or 1 tbsp yoghurt, 2 tbsp honey, 1tbsp olive oil) salt, as per taste 2 tbsp, oil Method Mix all the ingredients for the sauce and keep aside.
